entry.title: Hand Painted Pink Roses on Mint Green Porcelain Hat Pin Holder by artist Betty Platner - Limited Supply!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roses And Teacups
Type: Hat Pin Holder
Price: 23.99

Hand Painted Pink Roses on Mint Green Porcelain Hat Pin Holder by artist Betty Platner is in brand new in box. A rare collectible find indeed!!! Found these beauties deep in the warehouse and so glad we did!!  The hatpin holder was Hand Painted by Betty Platner and is Fine Porcelain. The measurement is 5-1/4" height x 4-14" diameter and the top pin holder measures 1-58" diameter. Excludes hat pins but we do sell those too.

entry.title: Ladies Ivory Victorian Touring Hat with Pink Crown #16012
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Pink Victorian Hats
Price: 89.99

Ladies Ivory Victorian Touring Hat with Pink Crown. This is our classic Touring hat that has a pink satin pleated top with pink and Ivory roses, pearl accents and Ivory feather. Finished off with an Ivory English netting bow and train down the back.

This amazingly elegant hat is hand made just for you at the time of your order.  This process includes hand dyed materials and is hand assembled which may take 7-10 days.  This is not a big box store hat but one that is made with great skill and talent.

entry.title: Children or Small Ladies Victorian Tea Party Hat #234
entry.s:type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
Price: 59.99

Girl's Designer Victorian Tea Party Hat Pink Children's or Small adult Victorian hat. This hat is a smaller version of our Ladies Victorian Touring hat. Inside size of hat is 21". It has a pleated pink satin top with petite pink bouquet flowers in front with a light pink feather and a ribbon/satin bow on side. Finished off with an English pink netting bow on back.

This hat is made just for you at the time of the order.  There are several steps involved in creating your hat that do require extra time such as hand dyeing and drying your embellishments plus the hand assembly.  These are made in the USA by a very talented artist that has carried on the creative talents of her mother.  This is not a hat that sits getting dusty on a shelf!  This is something special made just for you or your loved one as a gift she'll never forget! The turn around time for this process is usually 1-2 weeks but she is usually very quick.
